hero.bio: Information Technology Engineering student. Specialized in full-stack web development, passionate about learning, and focused on finding technological solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.bio: I am an Information Technology Engineering student with a strong focus on software development and continuous improvement. I am characterized by being proactive, passionate about learning, and committed to excellence in every project. I have experience in system and interface design and development, applying software engineering methodologies to ensure efficient, high-quality solutions.

p1.title: BlueShark - Gym Management System
p1.bio: Complete system for managing clients, memberships, payments, and attendance at a gym. Includes data analysis and inventory control.

p2.title: Optiruta
p2.bio: Prototype developed in Figma to practice developing clean and intuitive interfaces with reusable components to ensure an excellent UX/UI experience.

p3.title: Semantic Page - Languages and Automata
p3.bio: Informational website that applies semantic HTML tags and responsive design to be viewable on any device.

uni.title: Polytechnic University of Sinaloa
uni.bio: Currently in the seventh semester of the Information Technology Engineering program, specializing in software development, web architectures, and systems administration.

c1.title: IT Essentials
c1.bio: Certification on the fundamentals of hardware, software, networking, cybersecurity, and troubleshooting in IT environments.

c2.title: C# Programmer
c2.bio: Course focused on the fundamentals of the C# language and the .NET framework for creating desktop and backend applications.

c3.title: CCNA: Introduction to networks
c3.bio: Introductory certification to CCNA, covering network administration, routing, and interconnection.

c1.title: The Complete 2024 Web Development Bootcamp
c1.bio: Learning modern full-stack technologies, including Node.js, React, MongoDB, and Express.js to build complete web applications.
